website_summaries.verdict: Skin imperfections almost disappear once this full-coverage foundation is applied. Excellent performance, 40 shades, and long-lasting wear earn it our top spot.
pros: Tarte's Amazonian Clay Foundation distances itself from others by the brand by delivering full coverage
You are likely to find a shade that matches your skin tone, as it comes in 40 shades
cons: Can look cakey and settle in pores and fine lines if you apply it with a heavy hand
The thick consistency takes a little extra work to blend in thoroughly

customer_reviews.title: Full coverage and build-able, feels light on skin!
customer_reviews.text: First time purchasing this foundation and I am so happy with it! My old liquid foundation was discontinued (bare minerals bareskin) and it took me so long to find something comparable- and I finally have! This foundation is perfect for full coverage but not cake like. I’d say I like it just as much if not more than my previous baremineral product. This does not settle into lines/wrinkles and gives a nice overall tone to even out any imperfections. You don’t even need to apply concealer for redness/blemishes with this foundation at all. Very happy with this product and will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: ~Summer~

customer_reviews.title: Love this foundation
customer_reviews.text: I received this in my ipsy bag. Just fell in love with it. I've used Estee Lauder, MAC, etc foundations but this one I really love. Total coverage and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Marie

customer_reviews.title: best foundation ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best I have found. Stays on all day. perfect coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and price. The product itself must be used with a Kabuki brush. Tarte does carry one but any good brush will be great. Very light never blocks my pores or breaks my skin out. I’ve been using this product for 4 years. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: An easy Refill
customer_reviews.text: Have used this very clean, light coverage foundation for the past year. Love it. Needed a replacement and went to 2 Ulta Stores, to no avail. Then, realized that I could get it easily via Amazon at the same price with so much less hassle. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: EMc

customer_reviews.title: Covers acne scars
customer_reviews.text: Love the clay it gives super coverage to my acne scars
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Sharif

customer_reviews.title: Love this foundation!
customer_reviews.text: Does. Or leave my skin greasy at all- even after all day at work and a workout. I was very surprised, and wish I would have tried this brand sooner. Seriously I have tried so many drugstore brands and this is so worth the money compared to them all.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t the real tarte foundation. Doesn’t cover like the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Breeanna

customer_reviews.title: I love this foundation
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation. I am very picky when it comes to foundation. When my previous foundation was discontinued, I was in a panic. I have really a really uneven skin tone (very pink cheeks!) and this foundation is perfect on my sensitive skin. Though it is expensive, i think it is work it.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Great Coverage
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing, but it's expensive. It should last at least a year thought. Great matte coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Kimby

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful coverage . Must use a brush for application. Easy to apply correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have dry skin and I absolutely love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff. A little pricey, but well worth it and it last quite a while too!
customer_reviews.author: Saraya

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love Tarte foundation. It has great coverage, and stays on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I used to purchase the less-expensive foundation found at the pharmacy or Walmart, but found this through a friend and I’m a believer! As I’m aging, that cheaper foundation just doesn’t cover my skin’s flaws very well. The Tarte foundation is very lightweight, but offers perfect coverage & it just takes a small amount. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coverage for extremely sensitive (and damaged) skin!
customer_reviews.text: This the second tube I purchased! My first was the tan and now I just got the light so I can mix them and customize my colors as the seasons are changing. I have extremely sensitive adult (43 yrs old) skin. I can’t tolerate a regular SPF. Also, if I use the wrong foundation, I break out, terribly. This foundation has given me beautiful coverage, protection from the sun and no breakouts! I highly recommend this product if you have difficult skin like mine. 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: AMAZED ME
customer_reviews.text: First time ordering Tarte Amazonian Clay Foundation. I have been highly pleased with this product. Goes on and stays on. Good coverage too. I have a tendency to break out and haven't experienced any since using this. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J.warren M.

customer_reviews.title: good coverage
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of this in my Ipsy bag.. feels a lil heavier than the sample I had... but it still works great and covers well.
customer_reviews.author: Kari ruffeno

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear much makeup so I really got this to hide some blemish spots. Works GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Nimby5956

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Makes my face look pretty and I like that its cruelty free.
customer_reviews.author: val

customer_reviews.title: Love It. It is very smooth and soft
customer_reviews.text: Love It. It is very smooth and soft. Covers Everything!
customer_reviews.author: susanne

customer_reviews.title: It blends nicely I don't have any creasing or cracking
customer_reviews.text: They never ever have my shade at the store! So i'm ecstatic that i found it on Amazon.It's my exact shade.I also have very dry skin. It blends nicely I don't have any creasing or cracking. Hands,brush or beauty blender it always applies well on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: stacey marie

customer_reviews.title: best foundation!
customer_reviews.text: best foundation!!! i swear if i ever fell asleep with this product still on my face i would wake up with clearer skin because the ingredients are so great! highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice foundation, but not impressed with the coverage
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a foundation with more complete coverage. I didn't find that this covered any more than drug store brands. That being said, it is very creamy and feels nice on the skin. Still looking for a full coverage foundation...
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent foundation.
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth with lots of coverage. No animal testing. Clay based. Excellent foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Phariss

product_meta.title: Tarte Cosmetics Amazonian Clay 12-Hour Full Coverage Foundation 1.7 fl oz. (Light Neutral)
product_meta.description: Tarte's Amazonian Clay Full Coverage Foundation SPF 15 is an oil-free, vegan, matte liquid foundation that will breathe life back into your skin. It's a full-coverage foundation that's so easy to apply
feature_bullets: Color: Light Neutral - for light skin with pink and yellow undertones
Tarte Amazonian Clay Full Coverage Foundation Broad Spectrum SPF 15 sunscreen
